Paper.Title: Comparing Lexicalized Treebank Grammars Extracted from Chinese, Korean, and English Corpora

Section.Paragraph: In this paper, we present a method for comparing Lexicalized Tree Adjoining Grammars extracted from annotated corpora for three languages: English, Chinese and Korean. This method makes it possible to do a quantitative comparison between the syntactic structures of each language, thereby providing a way of testing the Universal Grammar Hypothesis, the foundation of modern linguistic theories.
